warnings: Warnings For External Use Only. Do not use • On wounds or damaged skin • In large quantities, particularly over raw surfaces or blistered areas When using this product • Avoid contact with the eyes • Do not bandage tightly Stop use and ask a doctor if • Condition worsens • Symptoms persist for more than 7 days • Symptoms clear up and occur again within a few days Keep out of reach of children. If swallowed, get medical help or contact a Poison Control Center (1-800-222-1222) right away.
dosage_administration: Directions • Adults and children 2 years of age and older: Apply to affected area not more than 3 to 4 times daily. • Children under 2 years of age: Consult a doctor
indications: Use(s) • For the temporary relief of pain associated with • Minor burns • Sunburn
